meanings.definition: Relating to or characterized by innovation.
meanings.sent1: The company's innovational approach to product development set them apart from competitors.
meanings.sent2: Her innovational ideas sparked a wave of creativity in the team.
meanings.sent3: The innovational design of the new office layout made everyone excited to come to work.
meanings.sent4: His innovational thinking was like a breath of fresh air in the stale industry.
meanings.sent5: The innovational concept of using recycled materials for packaging was both eco-friendly and cost-effective.

meanings.definition: Introducing something new; leading to or facilitating innovation.
meanings.sent1: The innovational technology revolutionized the way we communicate.
meanings.sent2: Their innovational approach to problem-solving brought about significant improvements.
meanings.sent3: The innovational twist in the plot of the movie kept the audience on the edge of their seats.
meanings.sent4: Her innovational leadership style was a beacon of inspiration for the entire team.
meanings.sent5: The innovational use of AI in the project was a game-changer for the industry.
